submission:
from typing import List


class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        action = []
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            x, y = nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]
            if x > y:
                x, y = y, x
            if y <= k:
                action.append((0, -1))
                action.append((y - x, -1))
                action.append((y - x + 1, 1))
                action.append((max(x, k - x, y, k - y) + 1, 1))
                action.append((k + 1, n))
            elif x <= k:
                if y - k > k:
                    action.append((0, -1))
                    action.append((max(x, k - x) + 1, 1))
                    action.append((k + 1, n))
                    action.append((y - k, -n - 1))
                    action.append((y - x, -1))
                    action.append((y - x + 1, 1))
                    action.append((y + 1, n))
                elif y - k > max(x, k - x):
                    action.append((0, -1))
                    action.append((max(x, k - x) + 1, 1))
                    action.append((y - k, - 1))
                    action.append((y - x, -1))
                    action.append((y - x + 1, 1))
                    action.append((y + 1, n))
                else:
                    action.append((0, - 1))
                    action.append((y - x, -1))
                    action.append((y - x + 1, 1))
                    action.append((y + 1, n))
            else:
                if y - k <= x:
                    if x - k > k:
                        action.append((y - x, -2))
                        action.append((y - x + 1, 2))
                        action.append((k + 1, n))
                        action.append((x - k, -n - 1))
                        action.append((y + 1, n))
                    elif y - x < x - k:
                        action.append((y - x, -2))
                        action.append((y - x + 1, 2))
                        action.append((x - k, -1))
                        action.append((y + 1, n))
                    else:
                        action.append((x - k, -1))
                        action.append((y - x, -1))
                        action.append((y - x + 1, 1))
                        action.append((y + 1, n))
                elif x - k > k:
                    if x - k <= y - x <= x:
                        action.append((k + 1, n))
                        action.append((x - k, -n - 1))
                        action.append((y - x, -1))
                        action.append((y - x + 1, 1))
                        action.append((x + 1, n))
                        action.append((y - k, -n))
                        action.append((y + 1, n))
                    else:
                        action.append((k + 1, n))
                        action.append((x - k, -n - 1))
                        action.append((x + 1, n + 1))
                        action.append((y - k, -n - 1))
                        action.append((y + 1, n))
                        action.append((y - x, -n - 2))
                        action.append((y - x, n + 2))
                elif y - x <= x:
                    action.append((x - k, -1))
                    action.append((y - x, -1))
                    action.append((y - x + 1, 1))
                    action.append((x + 1, n))
                    action.append((y - k, -n))
                    action.append((y + 1, n))
                else:
                    action.append((x - k, - 1))
                    action.append((x + 1, n))
                    action.append((y - x, -n - 1))
                    action.append((y - x + 1, n + 1))
                    action.append((y - k, -n))
                    action.append((y + 1, n))

        action.sort()
        ans = n
        m = len(action)
        idx = 0
        tmp = n
        while idx < m:
            now = action[idx][0]
            while idx < m and action[idx][0] == now:
                tmp += action[idx][1]
                idx += 1
            ans = min(ans, tmp)
        return ans
